name: hospitality
description:
Entry for the ludum dare 37 compo theme: one room.

Hospitality is a game about a hospitals hospitality...

how to play:

controls:

click anywhere with the left mouse button to set a path.

click anywhere with the right mouse button to set a new path.

press space to pause.

press alt to abandon victim patient.

press controll to drop evrything.

job description:

escort sick people to their beds.

give them medicine from the racks.

and escort them to the door on the right.

clean the beds after the leave put one new blankets from the racks.

repeat and don't let them die.
